blocks.text: This dashboard provides an overview and details on your Working Capital in particular Billing process analysis.

Structure of the Dashboard
  Page 1 - Overview: Leading KPIs and Process Discovery Widget.
Page 2 - Impact: Overview of current blockers on Billing Process and impact on your Order-to-Cash process.
Page 3 - Root Causes: Deep Dive into blockers of the process.
Page 4 - Take Action: A collection of ideas to tackle the drivers of inefficiencies.
Page 5 - Case Details: An exportable list of single cases and their most important attributes that can be filtered.
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.
Kindly provide feedback on the Dashboard, this will aid us in enhancing its functionality.

children.name: Lead time: Invoice creation to Accounts Receivable clearing
children.description: Average lead time for items that were cleared within a reference period

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  AVG(
    (
      SELECT
        LAST("InvoiceAccountingClearingDate")
      WHERE
        ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION '365days')
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST("InvoiceAccountingDocumentDate")
      WHERE
        ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION '365days')
    )
  )
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Open overdue Invoices
children.description: Number of overdue open customer Invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT (DISTINCT "ARUniqueKey") FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          COUNT (EVENT_NAME)
        WHERE
          (
            (
              NOW() > ("InvoiceDueDate")
            )
          )
      ) > 0
  ) AS "# Open Overdue Invoices"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE (NOT EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Clear Invoice'))

children.name: No Payment Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases where the Invoice is overdue and not cleared

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          COUNT (EVENT_NAME)
        WHERE
          (
            (
              NOW() > ("InvoiceDueDate")
            )
            AND ("InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" IS NULL)
          )
      ) > 0
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create Invoice')) * 100 AS "No Payment Rate"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Invoice Cancellations
children.description: Total number of Invoice Cancellations

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  count(event_name)
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE
  (event_name LIKE '%Invoice%Cancellation%')

children.name: AVG Process Cycle Time: Invoice Cancellations
children.description: Average process cycle time for Invoice Cancellations

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  avg(
    (
      SELECT
        LAST(End_time)
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST(End_time)
    )
  )
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  event_name MATCHES ('Create Invoice Cancellation')

children.name: Variant Explorer: Cases with Invoices not cleared
Late Payment Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases where the Invoice was cleared after its due date

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          COUNT(event_name)
        WHERE
          (
            "InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" > "InvoiceDueDate"
          )
      ) > 0
  ) / COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR(event_name IN ('Clear Invoice'))
      )
  ) * 100 AS "Late Payment Rate"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Open overdue Invoices by Customer Country
children.description: Number of open and overdue Invoices by Customer Country

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (DISTINCT "ARUniqueKey") FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          COUNT (EVENT_NAME)
        WHERE
          (
            (
              NOW() > ("InvoiceDueDate")
            )
          )
      ) > 0
  ) AS "# Open Overdue Invoices",
  Salesdoccustomercountry
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  (NOT EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Clear Invoice'))
  AND Salesdoccustomercountry IS NOT NULL

children.name: Top 10 Customers with open overdue Invoices
children.description: Top 10 customers with the open overdue Invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (DISTINCT "ARUniqueKey") FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          COUNT (EVENT_NAME)
        WHERE
          (
            (
              NOW() > ("InvoiceDueDate")
            )
          )
      ) > 0
  ) AS "# Open Overdue Invoices",
  Salesdoccustomercompany AS "Customer"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  (NOT EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Clear Invoice'))
ORDER BY
  1 DESC
LIMIT
  10

children.description: Percentage of cases where the Invoice is overdue and not cleared

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          COUNT (EVENT_NAME)
        WHERE
          (
            (
              NOW() > ("InvoiceDueDate")
            )
            AND ("InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" IS NULL)
          )
      ) > 0
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (

children.name: Late Payment Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases where the Invoice was cleared after its due date

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          COUNT(event_name)
        WHERE
          (
            "InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" > "InvoiceDueDate"
          )
      ) > 0
  ) / COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR(event_name IN ('Clear Invoice'))
      )
  ) * 100 AS "Late Payment Rate"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: No Payment Rate over Time
children.description: Percentage of cases where the Invoice is overdue and not cleared, breakdown by Invoice creation month

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'MONTH',
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Invoice creation date",
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          COUNT (EVENT_NAME)
        WHERE
          (
            (
              NOW() > ("InvoiceDueDate")
            )
            AND ("InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" IS NULL)
          )
      ) > 0
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create Invoice')) * 100 AS "No Payment Rate"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH')

children.name: Late Payment Rate over Time
children.description: Percentage of cases where the Invoice was cleared after its due date, breakdown by Invoice clearing month

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'MONTH',
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Invoice clearing date",
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          COUNT(event_name)
        WHERE
          (
            "InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" > "InvoiceDueDate"
          )
      ) > 0
  ) / COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR(event_name IN ('Clear Invoice'))
      )
  ) * 100 AS "Late Payment Rate"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Top 10 Customers with the highest Late Payment Rate
children.description: Top 10 customers with the highest late payment rate

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          COUNT(event_name)
        WHERE
          (
            "InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" > "InvoiceDueDate"
          )
      ) > 0

FROM

ORDER BY

  10

blocks.text: The purpose of this page is to drill down into the potential root causes of bad performance identified on the previous page. One of those RCA might be the following: Invoice Cancellations, Price Changes, Delivery Blocks, Dunning and Dispute cases.

children.name: Number of Cases with Quotation Item Price Changes after Invoice Creation
children.description: Total number of cases with Quotation Item Price changes after Invoice creation

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  count(case_id)
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  event_name MATCHES ('Create Invoice' ~> 'Change Quotation Item Price')

children.name: Price Changes over Time
children.description: Price changes in Quotation, Delivery Item, Sales Order over time

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('month', end_time) AS "Change Date",
  COUNT ("event_name") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOUR (
        EVENT_NAME LIKE 'Change%Price%'
      ) AS CHANGE MATCHES (CHANGE)
  ) AS "# Price Changes"
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('Month'),
  NULL

children.name: Top 10 Customer with the most Price Changes
children.description: Top 10 Customer with the most Price Changes (in Quotation, Delivery Item, Sales Order)

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT ("event_name") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOUR (
        EVENT_NAME LIKE 'Change%Price%'
      ) AS created_with_dialog MATCHES (created_with_dialog)
  ),
  "SalesDocCustomerCompany" AS "Customer"
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE
  SalesDocCustomerCompany IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
  2
ORDER BY
  1 DESC
LIMIT
  10

children.name: Invoice Cancellations over Time
children.description: Total number of Invoice cancellations in data set

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('month', end_time) AS "Change Date",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "InvoiceId") AS "# Invoice Cancellations"
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      end_time,
      event_name,
      "InvoiceId"
    FROM
      FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
    WHERE
      event_name = 'Create Invoice Cancellation'
  ) AS sub
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'),
  NULL

children.name: Invoice Cancellations by Sales Organization
children.description: Total number of Invoice cancellations by Sales Organization (nulls excluded)

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT "InvoiceId") AS "# Invoice Cancellations ",
  "SalesDocSalesOrganization"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  event_name MATCHES ('Create Invoice Cancellation')
  AND "SalesDocCustomerCountry" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  1 DESC

children.name: Top 10 Customers with the most Invoice Cancellations
children.description: Top 10 Customers with the most Invoice cancellations

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT "InvoiceId") AS "# Invoices",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "InvoiceId") FILTER (
    WHERE
      event_name MATCHES ('Create Invoice Cancellation')
  ) AS "# Invoice Cancellations",
  salesdoccustomercompany AS "Customer Company"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  salesdoccustomercompany IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  1 DESC
LIMIT
  20

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT "InvoiceId")
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE
  (event_name LIKE '%Invoice%Cancellation%')

children.name: AVG Process Cycle Time: Invoice Cancellations
children.description: Average process cycle time for cases with Invoice cancellations (Invoice Net amount)

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  AVG(
    (
      SELECT
        LAST(End_time)
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST(End_time)
    )
  )
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  event_name MATCHES ('Create Invoice Cancellation')

children.name: Invoice Cancellations by Customer Country
children.description: Total number of Invoice cancellations by Customer Country (nulls excluded)

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT "InvoiceId") AS "# Invoice Cancellations ",
  "SalesDocCustomerCountry" AS "Customer Country"
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE
  event_name = 'Create Invoice Cancellation'
  AND SalesDocCustomerCountry IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY

children.name: Invoice Cancellations by Company Code
children.description: Total number of Invoice cancellations compared to total number of Invoices by Company Code

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT "InvoiceId") AS "# Invoices",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "InvoiceId") FILTER (
    WHERE
      event_name MATCHES ('Create Invoice Cancellation')
  ) AS "# Invoice Cancellations",
  "InvoiceCompanyCode" AS "Company Code Name"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  InvoiceCompanyCode IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  1 DESC

children.name: Number of Cases with Dunning Blocks
children.description: Total number of cases with Dunning Blocks

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  count(case_id)
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE
  (
    event_name IN ('Set Dunning Block', 'Remove Dunning Block')
  )

children.name: AVG Process Cycle Time for Cases with Dunning Blocks
children.description: Average process cycle time for cases with Dunning Blocks

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  AVG(
    (
      SELECT
        LAST(end_time)
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST(end_time)
    )
  )
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  event_name MATCHES ('Remove Dunning Block')

children.name: RCA Deep Dive
children.description: Overview ordered by Invoice Value

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  --InvoiceCompanyCode,
  SalesDocSalesOrganization,
  SalesDocCustomerCountry,
  SalesDocCustomerCompany,
  SalesDocItemCategory,
  SalesDocItemMaterial,
  SalesDocItemMaterialGroup,
  SalesDocItemPlant,
  SalesDocType,
  SalesDocSalesOffice,
  SalesDocTradingPartner,
  ---Metrics---
  count(case_id) AS "# Sales Documents",
  SUM("InvoiceItemTotalNetAmountCurrConverted") AS "Invoice Item Total Net Amount Converted",
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%')
          OR BOOL_OR (EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%')
      )
  ) / count(case_id) * 100 AS "Percentage of cases with changes",
  AVG (
    (
      SELECT
        COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%'
            OR EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%'
        )
    )
  ) AS "Average number of changes",
  AVG (
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME)
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME)
    )
  ) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%')
          OR BOOL_OR (EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%')
      )
  ) AS "Average Cycle Time with Change Activities",
  COUNT ("SalesDocId") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name LIKE 'Create Quotation Item%'
      ) AS created MATCHES (created)
  ) AS "# Quotations",
  COUNT("event_name") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name LIKE 'Change Quotation%'
        OR event_name LIKE 'Update Quotation%'
      ) AS created_with_dialog MATCHES (created_with_dialog)
  ) AS "# of Quotation Changes",
  COUNT (DISTINCT "SalesDocId") AS "# of Sales Orders Items",
  COUNT("event_name") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name LIKE 'Change Sales%'
        OR event_name LIKE 'Update Sales%'
      ) AS CHANGED MATCHES (CHANGED)
  ) AS "# of SO Changes",
  COUNT("event_name") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name = 'Create Outbound Delivery'
      ) AS created MATCHES (created)
  ) AS "# of Delivery Items",
  COUNT("event_name") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name LIKE 'Change Delivery%'
        OR event_name LIKE 'Update Delivery%'
      ) AS CHANGED MATCHES (CHANGED)
  ) AS "# of Delivery Item Changes",
  COUNT ("InvoiceId") AS "# Invoices",
  COUNT("event_name") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name LIKE 'Change Invoice%'
        OR event_name LIKE 'Create Invoice Item Cancellation%'
        OR event_name LIKE 'Update Invoice%'
      ) AS CHANGED MATCHES (CHANGED)
  ) AS "# of Invoice Changes",
  COUNT("event_name") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (event_name LIKE 'Reject Sales%') AS rejections MATCHES (rejections)
  ) AS "# of SO Rejections",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "InvoiceId") FILTER (
    WHERE
      event_name MATCHES ('Create Invoice Cancellation')
  ) AS "# Invoices cancelled",
  count(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      event_name MATCHES ('Change Quotation Item Price')
      OR event_name MATCHES ('Change Sales Doc Item Price')
      OR event_name MATCHES ('Change Delivery Doc Item Price')
  ) / count(case_id) * 100 AS "Price Change Ratio",
  count(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      event_name MATCHES (
        'Create Invoice' ~> 'Change Quotation Item Price'
      )
      OR event_name MATCHES (
        'Create Invoice' ~> 'Change Sales Doc Item Price'
      )
      OR event_name MATCHES (
        'Create Invoice' ~> 'Change Delivery Doc Item Price'
      )
  ) / count(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      event_name MATCHES ('Change Quotation Item Price')
      OR event_name MATCHES ('Change Sales Doc Item Price')
      OR event_name MATCHES ('Change Delivery Doc Item Price')
  ) * 100 AS "Price Change Ratio (after Invoice creation)",
  COUNT("event_name") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name ILIKE 'Remove Dunning Block%'
      ) AS dunning_block MATCHES (dunning_block)
  ) AS "# of cases with Dunning Block",
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      ("InvoiceLastDunnedOn" IS NOT NULL)
  ) / COUNT(case_id) * 100 AS "Dunning Rate",
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          COUNT(event_name)
        WHERE
          (
            "InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" > "InvoiceDueDate"
          )
      ) > 0
  ) / COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR(event_name IN ('Clear Invoice'))
      )
  ) * 100 AS "Late Payment Rate"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  InvoiceItemTotalNetAmountCurrConverted IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  12 DESC

children.name: Number of SO Rejections
children.description: Total number of Sales Order Rejections in the data set

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT("event_name") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name LIKE 'Reject Sales%'
      ) AS rejections MATCHES (rejections)
  )
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)

children.name: Number of Cases with SD Price Changes after Invoice Creation
children.description: Total number of cases with Sales Document Item Price changes after Invoice creation

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  count(case_id)
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  event_name MATCHES (
    'Create Invoice' ~> 'Change Sales Doc Item Price'
  )

children.name: Number of Cases with DI Price Changes after Invoice Creation
children.description: Total number of cases with Delivery Document Item Price changes after Invoice creation

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  count(case_id)
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  event_name MATCHES (
    'Create Invoice' ~> 'Change Delivery Doc Item Price'
  )

children.name: Percentage of Cases with Price Changes after Invoice Creation
children.description: Percentage of cases with Quotation Item Price changes after Invoice creation compared with all cases with Price changes

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  count(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      event_name MATCHES ('Create Invoice' ~> 'Change Quotation Item Price')
      OR event_name MATCHES (
        'Create Invoice' ~> 'Change Sales Doc Item Price'
      )
      OR event_name MATCHES (
        'Create Invoice' ~> 'Change Delivery Doc Item Price'
      )
  ) / count(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      event_name MATCHES ('Change Quotation Item Price')
      OR event_name MATCHES ('Change Sales Doc Item Price')
      OR event_name MATCHES ('Change Delivery Doc Item Price')
  ) * 100 AS "Price Change Ratio"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Value of Invoice Cancellations
children.description: Total amount of Invoices cancelled

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  SUM("InvoiceItemTotalNetAmountCurrConverted") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name LIKE  '%Invoice%Cancellation%'
      ) AS cancelled MATCHES (cancelled)
  )
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)

children.name: Dunning Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases where the Invoice was dunned

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      ("InvoiceLastDunnedOn" IS NOT NULL)
  ) / COUNT(case_id) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Segregation of Duties
children.description: Details to the SO/Invoice Creation Compliancy (SO Creator, Invoice Creator, Clearing Creator checks) for manual users

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  SalesDocSalesOrganization,
  SalesDocCustomerCountry,
  SalesDocCustomerCompany,
  SalesDocItemCategory,
  SalesDocItemMaterial,
  SalesDocItemMaterialGroup,
  SalesDocItemPlant,
  SalesDocType,
  SalesDocSalesOffice,
  SalesDocTradingPartner,
  count(case_id) AS "# Sales Documents",
  SUM ("InvoiceNetAmountCurrConverted") AS "Invoice Item Total Net Amount Converted",
  SUM("Quotation = SO Creator") AS "# SDs with Quotation = SO Creator",
  SUM("Contract = SO Creator") AS "# SDs with Contract = SO Creator",
  SUM("SO = Invoice Creator") AS "# SDs with SO = Invoice Creator",
  SUM("Invoice Creator = Invoice Clearing Creator") AS "# SDs with Invoice Creator = Invoice Clearer"
FROM (
SELECT distinct
  --InvoiceCompanyCode,
  SalesDocSalesOrganization,
  SalesDocCustomerCountry,
  SalesDocCustomerCompany,
  SalesDocItemCategory,
  SalesDocItemMaterial,
  SalesDocItemMaterialGroup,
  SalesDocItemPlant,
  SalesDocType,
  SalesDocSalesOffice,
  SalesDocTradingPartner,
  ---Metrics---
  case_id,
"InvoiceNetAmountCurrConverted",
 CASE WHEN 
 LAST("EventCreatedByUserId") FILTER 
 (WHERE event_name = 'Create Sales Order Item') = 
 LAST("EventCreatedByUserId") FILTER 
 (WHERE event_name = 'Create Contract Item')
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "Contract = SO Creator",
 CASE WHEN 
 LAST("EventCreatedByUserId") FILTER 
 (WHERE event_name = 'Create Sales Order Item') = 
 LAST("EventCreatedByUserId") FILTER 
 (WHERE event_name = 'Create Quotation Item')
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "Quotation = SO Creator",
 CASE WHEN 
 LAST("EventCreatedByUserId") FILTER 
 (WHERE event_name = 'Create Sales Order Item') = 
 LAST("EventCreatedByUserId") FILTER 
 (WHERE event_name IN ( 'Create Invoice', 'Create Pro Forma Invoice'))
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "SO = Invoice Creator",
CASE WHEN 
 LAST("EventCreatedByUserId") FILTER 
 (WHERE event_name = 'Clear Invoice') = 
 LAST("EventCreatedByUserId") FILTER 
 (WHERE event_name IN ( 'Create Invoice', 'Create Pro Forma Invoice','Create Credit Memo','Create Debit Memo','Create Invoice Cancellation','Create Credit Memo Cancellation'))
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "Invoice Creator = Invoice Clearing Creator"
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE
  EventCreatedByUserType = 'Dialog' ) as sub
ORDER BY
  11 DESC

blocks.text: Please attach a number to your Business Case to visualize its impact. You can start by using the below Business Case Calculator.
Reduce long cycle times by:
Automating Invoice Creation
Automating Invoice Clearing
Reduce Rework. Avoid Looping
Reduce Manual Entries
Master data should be managed well
Check which vendors could improve on and examine what good vendors are doing
Avoid Price Changes, especially after Billing Creation - take care of Master Data
Deep Dive into Dunning Process
Deep Dive into Customer Payment Process: we recommend our Invoice-to-Cash Process Dashboards

children.name: Business Case Calculator
children.description: * FTE Cost / Min = ($70,000 รท  261 days/year รท 8 hours/ day รท  60 min/hr) = $0.56

children.name: Case Details
children.description: Case details for further investigation

children.name: Sales Document Details
children.description: Sales Document details for further investigation

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  case_id,
  "SalesDocId",
(
    SELECT
      LAST(end_time) FILTER (
        WHERE
          event_name IN (
            'Create Sales Order Item',
            'Create Quotation Item',
            'Create Contract Item'
          )
      )
  ) AS "SO Creation Date",
  "SalesDocType",
  "SalesDocSalesOrganization",
  "SalesDocItemQuantityOrdered",
  "SalesDocItemQuantityConfirmed",
  "DeliveryTotalQuantityDelivered",
  "LastDeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime" AS "On Time",
CASE
    WHEN "SalesDocItemQuantityConfirmed" = "DeliveryTotalQuantityDelivered" THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN "SalesDocItemQuantityConfirmed" < "DeliveryTotalQuantityDelivered" THEN 'Overdelivery'
    WHEN "SalesDocItemQuantityConfirmed" > "DeliveryTotalQuantityDelivered" THEN 'No'
  END AS "In Full",
  "SalesDocItemNetValue",
  "SalesDocCustomerCompany",
  "SalesDocCustomerCountry",
  "SalesDocItemMaterialGroup",
  "SalesDocItemMaterial",
  "SalesDocLastConfirmedDeliveryDate",
  "SalesDocPlannedShipmentDate" --  ,"SalesDocLastConfirmedDeliveryDate" >= "SalesDocPlannedShipmentDate" AS "On Time"
,
  "LastDeliveryWarehouse"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS 
ORDER BY
  3 DESC

children.name: Invoice Details
children.description: Billing Invoice Details for further investigation

dataSource.query:
SELECT DISTINCT 
  case_id,
  "SalesDocId",
(
    SELECT
      LAST(end_time) FILTER (
        WHERE
          event_name IN (
            'Create Sales Order Item',
            'Create Quotation Item',
            'Create Contract Item'
          )
      )
  ) AS "SO Creation Date",
  InvoiceCompanyCode,
  "SalesDocType",
  "SalesDocSalesOrganization",
  "SalesDocCustomerCompany",
  "SalesDocCustomerCountry",
  "SalesDocItemMaterialGroup",
  "SalesDocItemMaterial",
  LastInvoiceId,
CASE
    WHEN event_name MATCHES ('Clear Invoice') THEN 'cleared'
    ELSE 'open'
  END AS "Invoice Clearing Status",
  CASE
    WHEN event_name MATCHES ('Clear Invoice') THEN 'cleared'
    WHEN (
      DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" > DURATION '0day'
    )
    AND (
      DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" <= DURATION '3day'
    ) THEN 'a. Due date passed 1-3 days'
    WHEN (
      DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" > DURATION '3day'
    )
    AND (
      DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" <= DURATION '7day'
    ) THEN 'b. Due date passed 3-7 days'
    WHEN (
      DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" > DURATION '7day'
    )
    AND (
      DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" <= DURATION '15day'
    ) THEN 'c. Due date passed 7-15 days'
    WHEN (
      DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" > DURATION '15day'
    )
    AND (
      DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" <= DURATION '30day'
    ) THEN 'd. Due date passed 15-30 days'
    WHEN (
      DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" > DURATION '30day'
    ) THEN 'e. Due date passed in 30+ days'
    WHEN "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) = DURATION '0day' THEN 'f. Due today'
    WHEN (
      "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '0day'
    )
    AND (
      "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '3day'
    ) THEN 'g. Due date in 1-3 days'
    WHEN (
      "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '3day'
    )
    AND (
      "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '7day'
    ) THEN 'h. Due date in 3-7 days'
    WHEN (
      "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '7day'
    )
    AND (
      "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '15day'
    ) THEN 'i. Due date in 7-15 days'
    WHEN (
      "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '15day'
    )
    AND (
      "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '30day'
    ) THEN 'j. Due date in 15-30 days'
    WHEN (
      "InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '30day'
    ) THEN 'k. Due date in 30+ days'
  END AS "Due dates",
  LastInvoiceAccountingDocumentId,
  InvoicePaymentTerms,
  InvoiceCashDiscountDays1,
  InvoiceCashDiscountDays2,
  InvoiceNetPaymentTermsPeriod,
  InvoiceCashDiscountDate1,
  InvoiceCashDiscountDate2,
  InvoiceCashDiscountPercentage1,
  InvoiceCashDiscountPercentage2,
  InvoiceItemTotalGrossCashDiscountAmount,
  InvoiceItemTotalGrossCashDiscountAmountCurrConverted,
  InvoiceItemTotalNetAmount,
  InvoiceItemTotalGrossAmount,
  InvoiceItemTotalNetAmountCurrConverted,
  InvoiceItemTotalGrossAmountCurrConverted,
  InvoiceItemTotalGrossAmountPaid,
  InvoiceItemTotalGrossAmountPaidCurrConverted,
  InvoiceItemTotalQuantity,
  InvoiceTotalUnplannedDeliveryCosts,
  InvoiceTransactionCode,
  InvoiceCurrency,
  LastInvoiceDocumentType,
  LastInvoiceCreateUserType,
  InvoiceDunningBlock,
  InvoiceDunningLevel,
  InvoiceDunningArea,
  InvoiceLastDunnedOn
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
	LastInvoiceId IS NOT NULL

children.name: Delivery Details
children.description: Case delivery details for further investigation

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  case_id,
  "SalesDocId",
(
    SELECT
      LAST(end_time) FILTER (
        WHERE
          event_name IN (
            'Create Sales Order Item',
            'Create Quotation Item',
            'Create Contract Item'
          )
      )
  ) AS "SO Creation Date",
  "SalesDocType",
  "SalesDocSalesOrganization",
  "SalesDocItemQuantityOrdered",
  "SalesDocItemQuantityConfirmed",
  "DeliveryTotalQuantityDelivered",
  "LastDeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime" AS "On Time",
CASE
    WHEN "SalesDocItemQuantityConfirmed" = "DeliveryTotalQuantityDelivered" THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN "SalesDocItemQuantityConfirmed" < "DeliveryTotalQuantityDelivered" THEN 'Overdelivery'
    WHEN "SalesDocItemQuantityConfirmed" > "DeliveryTotalQuantityDelivered" THEN 'No'
  END AS "In Full",
  "DeliveryCategory",
  "DeliveryItemCategory",
  "DeliveryPlannedDeliveryDate",
  "DeliveryPlannedPickingDate",
  "DeliveryShippingType",
  "DeliveryTotalQuantityDelivered",
  "DeliveryType"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS 
ORDER BY
  3 DESC
